title: Pyke was actually a mistake
body:
I mean seriously, what part of “assassin support” sounds like a reasonable design philosophy? Cool, this no-income champion can true damage reset execute entire teams. And that’s probably the most reasonable part of his kit. 

But at least he’s actually a cool character with nice vocals. This is in complete contrast to riven, the ugliest champion in the game with the voice of a 5 year old trying to be a Chinese cartoon character.
